name: Temple of Giants (IGAD Breda University of Applied Science)
name_original: Temple of Giants (IGAD Breda University of Applied Science)
description:
Temple of Giants is a third-person puzzle-platformer set in Ancient greece. In this singleplayer experience you play as Nysa, a greek demi-godess with earthbending powers, who tries to save her mother from a monster who destroyed her mother's temple.

This is the second year student project made at Breda University of Applied Science.

Disclaimer: This is a student project and may contain bugs. If found press F12 to take a screenshot and send feedback so the development team can improve upon it.
